  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205424</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Work in Progress: Andy Goldsworthy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Arbeit in Bewegung: Andy Goldsworthy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Travail en marche : Andy Goldsworthy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Trabalho em andamento: Andy Goldsworthy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lavoro in progresso: Andy Goldsworthy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εργασία υπό εξέλιξη: Θ*Ανδυ Goldsworthy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Trabajo en marcha: Andy Goldsworthy</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">SPARK visits with international artist Andy Goldsworthy as he installs his commissioned work "Drawn Stone" in the entrance courtyard of the de Young Museum in San Francisco. This Educator Guide is about Goldsworthy and the history of artists working with the landscape and environment.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">FUNKEN-Besuche mit internationalem Künstler Andy 
Goldsworthy, wie er seine beauftragene Arbeit "gezeichneten Stein" in 
den Eingang Hof de Young Museum in San Francisco installiert. 
Diese Erzieher-Anleitung ist über Goldsworthy und die 
Geschichte der Künstler, die mit der Landschaft und der Umgebung 
arbeiten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Visites d'ÉTINCELLE avec l'artiste international 
Andy Goldsworthy comme il installe son travail commissionné "pierre 
dessinée" dans la cour d'entrée de de Young Museum dans San 
Francisco. Ce guide d'éducateur est au sujet de Goldsworthy et
de l'histoire des artistes travaillant avec l'horizontal et 
l'environnement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Visitas da FAÍSCA com artista internacional Andy 
Goldsworthy como instala seu trabalho comissão "pedra desenhada" no 
pátio da entrada do de Novo Museu em San Francisco. Esta guia 
do educador é sobre Goldsworthy e o history dos artistas que 
trabalham com a paisagem e o ambiente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Chiamate della SCINTILLA con l'artista 
internazionale Andy Goldsworthy come installa il suo lavoro incaricato
"pietra dissipata" nel courtyard dell'entrata del de Young Museum a 
San Francisco. Questa guida dell'educatore è circa Goldsworthy 
e la storia degli artisti che lavorano con il paesaggio e l'ambiente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επισκέψεις ΣΠΙΝΘΗΡΩΝ με το διεθνή καλλιτέχνη Andy 
Goldsworthy δεδομένου ότι εγκαθιστά την ανατεθειμένη εργασία 
του "συρμένη πέτρα" στο προαύλιο εισόδων του de Young 
Museum στο Σαν Φρανσίσκο. Αυτός ο οδηγός εκπαιδευτικών 
είναι για Goldsworthy και την ιστορία των καλλιτεχνών που 
εργάζονται με το τοπίο και το περιβάλλον.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Visitas de la CHISPA con el artista internacional 
Andy Goldsworthy como él instala su trabajo comisionado "piedra 
trazada" en el patio de la entrada del de Young Museum en San 
Francisco. Esta guía del educador está sobre Goldsworthy y la 
historia de los artistas que trabajan con el paisaje y el ambiente.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
